body_html:
We have not verified with cudnn 6 yet. It may work, or it may not work, no guarantees.

@bicubic I think somehow GPU device is invisible to your TF installation, but just to make sure could you try:

import tensorflow as tf
tf.test.is_gpu_available()

body:
We have not verified with cudnn 6 yet. It may work, or it may not work, no guarantees.

@bicubic I think somehow GPU device is invisible to your TF installation, but just to make sure could you try:

```
import tensorflow as tf
tf.test.is_gpu_available()
```
